Name: Ibrahim Al-Jibreen
BioText: Sheikh Ibrahim Al-Jibreen is one of the Quran reciters in Saudi Arabia . He was born in Riyadh in 1392/1972. He joined the College of Fundamentals of Religion in the University of Imam Mohamed Bin Saud in Riyadh, where he received a bachelor's degree and master's degree in Islamic Studies, and he is the head of Dorob group for investment and he worked as an imam in many mosques in Saudi Arabia.
